messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2428
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/3/02 2:31:21 AM, PSoroosh@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/3/02 2:31:21 AM, PSoroosh@... writes:

<< My doctor said that it is true that most growth happens at night. I have
no
idea why and never looked into it - but he said it as if it was a fact. >>

At night or when people are asleep?

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2428
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/2/2002 4:55:19 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... My doctor said that it is true that most growth happens at night. I have no idea why and
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/2/2002 4:55:19 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> <<He feels that sleep brings growth only at night>>

My doctor said that it is true that most growth happens at night. I have no
idea why and never looked into it - but he said it as if it was a fact.

--pam
